member.name: D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT1.D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT1_SHADER_LOAD
member.summary: The HLSL Load function for texture objects is supported.

summary.para: The HLSL Sample function for texture objects is supported.
summary.div: Note If the device supports the format as a resource (1D, 2D, 3D, or cube map) but doesn't support this option, the resource can still use the Sample method but must use only the point filtering sampler state to perform the sample.

summary.para: The HLSL SampleCmp and SampleCmpLevelZero functions for texture objects are supported.
summary.div: Note Windows 8 and later might provide limited support for these functions on Direct3D feature levels 9_1, 9_2, and 9_3. For more info, see Implementing shadow buffers for Direct3D feature level 9.
